content.rendered:
Vmaxinfo Instituteis the only institute which provide individual attention to students for all I.T. courses. Individual Training available for many courses which result in help to develop individuals across a wide range of needs and can even benefit them on a personal level.

With Individual attention to our Students result in benefits like establish and act towards achieving goals, Increased engagement, Deeper level of learning, Build a personal awareness, Support for improving specific skills.

We have following courses available:

  • Web Design
  • Web Development
  • PHP MySQL
  • C,C++ Programming
  • Core Java and Advance Java
  • Python
  • Android App Development
  • Software Testing
  • Automation Testing
  • Digital Marketing
  • Robotics
  • MATLAB

Check our review on Google for training and service here.
